title: New Customer Acquisition - Fiber Internet
description: A potential customer in a new housing development wants to sign up for the fastest available fiber internet.

tasks.description: Verify that the new address is serviceable for fiber.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the address has fiber coverage.

tasks.description: Present the different fiber speed tiers (e.g., 300 Mbps, 1 Gbps) and their prices.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly explains the available fiber plans.

tasks.description: Process the order for the 1 Gbps plan and schedule a professional installation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates the order and books a technician.
